attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I've noticed recently that most petitions are simply ignored by the PM and are replied to with the usual nonsense justifying what the petition is against.
This particular petition is to make him listen to these petitions and actually do what is being voted upon in these petitions which have thousands of votes or abandon the petitions altogether as they are clearly a waste of time and money in there current state.
I am sick of seeing responses from the government along the lines of: 
"I thought I would reply personally to those who signed up, to explain why the Government believes *whatever we are voting against*, will help make Britain a safer place."

Listen to these petitions or abandon them altogether
